articles.description: Norway's Viktor Hovland hits a superb bogey-free seven-under-par 63 to win the PGA Tour's season-ending Tour Championship by five shots in Atlanta.
articles.title: Hovland wins season-ending Tour Championship

articles.description: Darwin Nunez goes from "agent of chaos" to "architect of a truly remarkable turnaround" in firing ten-man Liverpool to a remarkable comeback victory at Newcastle.
articles.title: 'Agent of chaos' Nunez turns Liverpool saviour

articles.description: Max Verstappen's achievements in dominating this season are being "underestimated", according to two-time world champion Fernando Alonso.
articles.title: Verstappen's success underestimated - Alonso

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson is forced to settle for silver as Kenya's Mary Moraa triumphs in a thrilling 800m final at the World Championships.
articles.title: Hodgkinson takes Worlds silver in thrilling 800m

articles.description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson wins her second consecutive silver medal in the 800m at the World Athletics Championships as Kenya's Mary Moraa takes gold.
articles.title: GB's Hodgkinson wins 800m silver as Moraa takes gold

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his third Team of the Week this season?
articles.title: Who 'conjured a couple of magic tricks' - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Oval Invincibles stage a remarkable fightback to beat Manchester Originals and win the men's Hundred at Lord's.
articles.title: Invincibles fight back to win men's Hundred

articles.description: Aston Villa's team bus is attacked following the game at Burnley, causing significant damage but no injuries.
articles.title: Aston Villa team bus attacked after win at Burnley

articles.description: Watch highlights as Tom Curran and Jimmy Neesham's 127-run partnership sees the Oval Invincibles recover from a 34-5 start to beat the Manchester Originals by 14 runs and win the men's Hundred final at Lords.
articles.title: Curran & Neesham lead Invincibles to Hundred title

articles.description: Southern Brave, led by Anya Shrubsole in her last game as a professional, finally won the women's Hundred by outclassing Northern Superchargers at Lord's.
articles.title: Brave beat Superchargers to win women's Hundred
